NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 35858? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Pipeline}'s peak at {38989},{Rail Freight}'s peak at {40240},{Container Ship}'s peak at {42092}
